765960.name: Bomber Crew Season Pass
765960.description:
Ever longed to take your crew on more wild and wondrous adventures in Bomber Crew? Fear not, for the Season Pass is here!

Gain access to all currently released content, alongside one further campaign and one additional skin pack yet to be announced – with a substantial saving compared to buying each piece of DLC individually.

Season Pass includes:
- Secret Weapons DLC pack (Out Now!)
- USAAF DLC Pack (Out Now!)
- Sounds Of The Sky – The Bomber Crew Soundtrack (Out Now!)
- Bomber Crew Fancy Skin Pack (Out Now!)
- Bomber Crew Skin Pack 2 (Out Now!)
765960.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 波兰语, 日语, 韩语, 简体中文
